DAO - package DAO
 
database - package database
 
DBOpenConnection() - Static method in class database.SchedulerDatabase
Uses the JDBC driver along with the URL + username and password to connect to the database.
Division_ID - Variable in class controller.customersController
 
DivisionsList - Class in util
Util class that handles the Divisions list, and how the Customer Divisions ComboBox changes based on the Country selected.
DivisionsList() - Constructor for class util.DivisionsList
 
DropAppointment(int, Connection) - Static method in class DAO.AppointmentsDAO
Called when the user deletes an appointment, the SQL Query removes the appointment entry based on its corresponding ID number.
DropCustomer(int, Connection) - Static method in class DAO.CustomersDAO
Called when the user deletes a Customer, the SQL Query removes the Customer entry based on its corresponding ID number.
